attributes.action: Stop early release of domestic violence abusers
attributes.additional_details:
His mother - he robbed, broke her wrist and she caught pneumonia. 
We all could have died.
attributes.background:
My attacker is due parole after doing less than half his sentence. 
He stabbed me over 70 times, slashed my throat. 
His girlfriend of 18 years - he set her alight and tried throwing her off a three-storey balcony.
